forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. South southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a calm night lingers, draping the city in a gentle embrace of clear skies and cool air, with temperatures settling around 52. The tranquility continues into the dawn hours, promising a sunny Monday. As the sun begins its ascent, expect a warm high near 72, peaking around midday before easing into a milder afternoon, where the mercury hovers around a comfortable 66. A soft southwest breeze whispers through the streets, effortlessly wafting the scent of the bay, creating an ideal backdrop for the day ahead.

With those delicate conditions, the city is set to shine, revealing its iconic vistas free of fog or haze. The clarity of the day inspires strolls along the waterfront or leisurely time spent in the lush greenery of the parks, where the vibrant colors are sure to captivate. Dress in layers—a light cardigan or jacket in the morning can be easily shed by noon, allowing you to savor the warmth without discomfort. Today is a captivating reminder to embrace the simplicity of the city: a cycle through Golden Gate Park, an afternoon coffee at a corner café, or an unhurried visit to a local gallery—activities that resonate with the collective heart of this urban haven.
